column3: Traffic;Preah Sihanouk:------ There was a fatal traffic accident at 10:32 am on October 27
column5: Prey Nop. One person was killed and two others seriously injured.------A white HINO heading from Sihanoukville toward Phnom Penh
column6: hit a  HYUNDAI  without a license plate carrying live chickens coming from the opposite direction. The driver and two passengers are
column8: unidentified.------The accident killed one person at the scene and two men were seriously injured.------The two victims are now being treated at the private clinic. The HINO driver ran away. *Many chickens also escaped their boxes
column9: while some appear to have died in the incident.------POST NEWS
